DP.INITIALISED.brief: Flag set to true if the DataPool has been initialised, false if otherwise.

DP.BOARD_INITIALISED.brief: Flag set to true if the Board driver has been initialised, false otherwise.

DP.EVENTMANAGER.INITIALISED.brief: Flag indicating whether or not the EventManager has been  initialised.

DP.EVENTMANAGER.ERROR_CODE.brief: Stores an error code coming from the EventManager.

DP.EVENTMANAGER.MAX_EVENTS_REACHED.brief: Flag which is true if the maximum number of events have been raised, indicating that some events may be missed.

DP.EVENTMANAGER.NUM_RAISED_EVENTS.brief: Counter storing the number of raised events.

DP.EVENTMANAGER.EVENT_LIST_SIZE.brief: The current size of the allocated event lists.

DP.IMU.INITIALISED.brief: Flag indicating whether or not the Imu has been initialised.

DP.IMU.ERROR_CODE.brief: Stores errors that occur during operation.

DP.IMU.I2C_ERROR_CODE.brief: Stores errors from the I2C module.

DP.IMU.COMMAND.brief: Command the Imu module shall execute.

DP.IMU.GYROSCOPE_DATA_VALID.brief: True when the data contained in DP.IMU.GYROSCOPE_DATA is valid.

DP.IMU.MAGNE_SENSE_ADJUST_DATA.brief: Sensetivity adjustment data from the magnetometer.

DP.IMU.MAGNETOMETER_DATA_VALID.brief: True when the data contained in DP.IMU.MAGNETOMETER_DATA is valid.

DP.IMU.TEMPERATURE_DATA_VALID.brief: True when the data contained in DP.IMU.TEMPERATURE_DATA is valid.

DP.MEMSTOREMANAGER.EEPROM_ERROR_CODE.brief: Error code from the EEPROM driver.

DP.MEMSTOREMANAGER.CFG_FILE_1_OK.brief: Indicates if the first configuration file is OK.

DP.MEMSTOREMANAGER.CFG_FILE_2_OK.brief: Indicates if the second configuration file is OK.

DP.MEMSTOREMANAGER.CFG_FILE_3_OK.brief: Indicates if the third configuration file is OK.

DP.EPS.INITIALISED.brief: Flag indicating whether or not the Eps has been initialised.

DP.EPS.ERROR_CODE.brief: Stores errors that occur during operation.

DP.EPS.STATE.brief: The current state of the Eps module.

DP.EPS.CONFIG_SYNCED.brief: Indicates if the configuration of the EPS is synchronised (matches with) the config specified in the OBC's config file.

DP.EPS.NEW_REQUEST.brief: Flag indicating that there's a new request to send to the EPS.

DP.EPS.EPS_REQUEST[EPS_MAX_UART_FRAME_LE.brief: The request (command) to be sent in EPS_STATE_REQUEST.

DP.EPS.EPS_REQUEST_LENGTH.brief: Length of the request stored in DP.EPS.EPS_REQUEST.

DP.EPS.EPS_REPLY_LENGTH.brief: Length of the reply stored in DP.EPS.EPS_REPLY

DP.EPS.UART_FRAME_NUMBER.brief: Frame number of the latest UART frame to be sent.

DP.EPS.COMMAND_STATUS.brief: The status of the most recently sent command.

DP.EPS.HK_DATA.brief: Most up-to-date housekeeping data returned by the EPS.

DP.MISSION.INITIALISED.brief: Flag indicating if the Mission App has been initialised (true) or not (false).

DP.MISSION.ERROR_CODE.brief: Stores errors that occur during operation.
